ddl_create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS oasisreport (schemalocation TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (schemalocation));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS messageheader (timedate TEXT, source TEXT, version TEXT, oasisreport_schemalocation TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (oasisreport_schemalocation) REFERENCES oasisreport(schemalocation), PRIMARY KEY (timedate, source, version));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS messagepayload (id TEXT, oasisreport_schemalocation TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (oasisreport_schemalocation) REFERENCES oasisreport(schemalocation), PRIMARY KEY (id));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rto (name TEXT, messagepayload_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (messagepayload_id) REFERENCES messagepayload(id), PRIMARY KEY (name));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_item (id TEXT, rto_name TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (rto_name) REFERENCES rto(name), PRIMARY KEY (id));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_header (system TEXT, report TEXT, sec_per_interval INTEGER, mkt_type TEXT, tz TEXT, uom TEXT, interval TEXT, report_item_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (report_item_id) REFERENCES report_item(id), PRIMARY KEY (system, report, sec_per_interval, mkt_type, tz, uom, interval));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_data (data_item TEXT, id TEXT, granularity TEXT, value REAL, fcst_publication_gmt TEXT, baa_id TEXT, interval_start_gmt TEXT, report_item_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (report_item_id) REFERENCES report_item(id), PRIMARY KEY (data_item, id, granularity, value, fcst_publication_gmt, baa_id, interval_start_gmt));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS disclaimer_item (disclaimer TEXT, rto_name TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (rto_name) REFERENCES rto(name), PRIMARY KEY (disclaimer));
